oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: American Ace Coffee show - 1948-03-20 - Part 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 5 of the American Ace Coffee show (usually a Grand Ole Opry segment) from March 20, 1948. Featuring Ralph Christian (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys, and performers Jimmy Riddle, Pap's Jug Band, Tommy Magness, Bashful Brother Oswald, Joe Zinkan, the Bailes Brothers (Johnnie and Homer), and Sonny Day. Held at the Municipal Auditorium in Shreveport, LA.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pap's Jug Band
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: American Ace Coffee commercial (Roy Acuff, Ralph Christian) -- Roy Acuff introduces Pap's Jug Band -- Uncle Noah's Ark (Pap's Jug Band) [continued in part 6]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: American ace show (Radio program); Christian, Ralph; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Wilson, Lonnie; Pap's Jug Band; Magness, Tommy; Bashful Brother Oswald; Zinkan, Joe; Bailes Brothers; Bailes, Homer, 1922-; Bailes, Johnnie, 1918-1989; Day, Sonny (Accordionist); KWKH (Radio station : Shreveport, La.);
